text: Uaru fernandezyepezi is a species of cichlid native to South America where it is found in rivers of the Orinoco River basin. This species can reach a length of TL. It is also found in the aquarium trade. ==See also== * Uaru * Cichlid * List of freshwater aquarium fish species ==References== * Stawikowski, R. (1989)Ein neuer Cichlide aus dem oberen Orinoco-Einzug: Uaru fernandezyepezi n. sp. (Pisces: Perciformes: Cichlidae). Bonner Zoologische Beiträge v. 40 (no. 1): 19-26. fernandezyepezi Category:Fish described in 1989
title: Uaru fernandezyepezi
